Preterite.text: Lad dike mqatalle (ʕam ḥḏoḏe), mgamballe ḥḏoḏe bu admo. (İlyas p.c)
Lak kalbe mqatalle, mgamballe ḥḏoḏe bu ṭino. (İlyas p.c)
6. Maḥatte bu+gubo, maḥatte bu+gubo, azzeyo w mədde i+qeməstayḏe, mədde i+qeməstayḏe, mgamblalle bayn u…bayn u+admo, bayn u+hno.
They threw him into a cistern, they threw him into a cistern, it passed and they took his shirt, they took his shirt, they dunked it into… into blood, into a whatsit. (Joseph Story)
U zlam nafәl mi goro, mgambal bu admo. (İlyas p.c) the man fell from the roof, he became awash in blood

idioms: вывалять (в грязи);  to dunk/bathe into mud
